column5: One last report from Simcoe today....had great few hours with my older son....he got another white fish on his own while I was securing the hut because of the wind. Love to see him getting into it all on his own....much more enjoyable than my own fish ;-) Anyhow....another Meggs show today....right on bottom even though some fish came higher up..... Ice is deteroating quickly from underneat and with shore ice also melting I will likely skip next weekend. Therefore this will be my last white fish report for the ice season....  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
Boy, have the boys grown.  Well done  Walkers will be fine, as long as we can get on.
